Page Profile Popular Reviews: Displays list of Page's popular reviews. Setting for this widget is available in widget settings tab of Page - Reviews admin.
Sayfa Profile Popular Reviews: Displays list of Sayfa's popular reviews. Setting for this widget is available in widget settings tab of Sayfa - Reviews admin.

Page Profile Popular Reviews: Displays list of Page's most commented reviews. Setting for this widget is available in widget settings tab of Page - Reviews admin.
Sayfa Profile Popular Reviews: Displays list of Sayfa's most commented reviews. Setting for this widget is available in widget settings tab of Sayfa - Reviews admin.

Page Profile Popular Reviews: Displays list of Page's most liked reviews. Setting for this widget is available in widget settings tab of Page - Reviews admin.
Sayfa Profile Popular Reviews: Displays list of Sayfa's most liked reviews. Setting for this widget is available in widget settings tab of Sayfa - Reviews admin.

Page Profile Popular Reviews: This widget forms the Reviews tab on the Page Profile and displays the reviews of the Page. It should be placed in the Tabbed Blocks area of the Page Profile.
Sayfa Profile Popular Reviews: This widget forms the Reviews tab on the Sayfa Profile and displays the reviews of the Sayfa. It should be placed in the Tabbed Blocks area of the Sayfa Profile.

Page Profile Popular Reviews: Displays a Page's review ratings on it's profile.
Sayfa Profile Popular Reviews: Displays a Sayfa's review ratings on it's profile.

Page Profile Popular Reviews: Displays the top rated Pages of the site.
Sayfa Profile Popular Reviews: Displays the top rated Sayfalar of the site.

Page Profile Popular Reviews: Displays the most recent reviews of the site.
Sayfa Profile Popular Reviews: Displays the most recent reviews of the site.

Page Profile Popular Reviews: This widget shows the top reviewers for the Pages on your site based on the number of reviews posted by them.
Sayfa Profile Popular Reviews: This widget shows the top reviewers for the Sayfalar on your site based on the number of reviews posted by them.

Page Profile Popular Reviews: Displays Featured Reviews as chosen by you from the Manage Ratings & Reviews section in the admin panel of this extension.
Sayfa Profile Popular Reviews: Displays Featured Reviews as chosen by you from the Manage Ratings & Reviews section in the admin panel of this extension.

Page Profile Popular Reviews: Displays the Review of the Day for Pages as selected by the Admin from the widget settings section of Reviews and Ratings Extension.
Sayfa Profile Popular Reviews: Displays the Review of the Day for Sayfalar as selected by the Admin from the widget settings section of Reviews and Ratings Extension.

Page Profile Popular Reviews: This tabbed AJAX widget concisely shows important information about reviews in 3 tabs: Recent, Popular, Top Reviewers.
Sayfa Profile Popular Reviews: This tabbed AJAX widget concisely shows important information about reviews in 3 tabs: Recent, Popular, Top Reviewers.

Page Profile Popular Reviews: Displays popular reviews for Pages on your site. From the edit popup of this widget, you can set the number of reviews to show in this widget and the criteria for popularity.
Sayfa Profile Popular Reviews: Displays popular reviews for Sayfalar on your site. From the edit popup of this widget, you can set the number of reviews to show in this widget and the criteria for popularity.

Page Profile Popular Reviews: This widget should be placed on the Page Review View Page.
Sayfa Profile Popular Reviews: This widget should be placed on the Sayfa Review View Sayfa.

Page Profile Popular Reviews: Displays the form for searching Page Reviews on the basis of various filters. You can edit the fields to be available in this form.
Sayfa Profile Popular Reviews: Displays the form for searching Sayfa Reviews on the basis of various filters. You can edit the fields to be available in this form.

Page Profile Popular Reviews: Displays the Most Commented Page Reviews. You can choose the number of entries to be shown.
Sayfa Profile Popular Reviews: Displays the Most Commented Sayfa Reviews. You can choose the number of entries to be shown.

Page Profile Popular Reviews: Displays the Most Liked Page Reviews. You can choose the number of entries to be shown.
Sayfa Profile Popular Reviews: Displays the Most Liked Sayfa Reviews. You can choose the number of entries to be shown.

Page Profile Popular Reviews: Displays the ReviewDetails. You can choose the number of entries to be shown.
Sayfa Profile Popular Reviews: Displays the ReviewDetails. You can choose the number of entries to be shown.

Sayfa Profile Popular Reviews: This is the view sayfa for a sayfa review.
